info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 13 at 4:02PM CDT until May 13 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL CLINTON AND SOUTHERN BOND COUNTIES... At 402 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over St. Rose, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Breese, Carlyle, Aviston, St. Rose, Germantown, Albers, Beckemeyer, Beaver Creek, Jamestown, Pierron, Bartelso, Stolletown, and Posey. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
